mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBLPY_RCPT A LEFT OUTER JOIN TBLPY_RCPT_CNCL B ON A.PYM_SEQ_NO = B.PYM_SEQ_NO , TSYCO_USER C WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SO_ID = #{receiptCancel.soId} /* SO_ID */ AND C.USER_ID = A.REGR_ID AND A.DPST_CL <> '22' /* 필수조건 */ AND A.DPST_CL <> '40' /* 필수조건(청구차감된 원포인트는 수납취소불가) */
AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID = #{receiptCancel.pymAcntId} /* 납부계정ID */
AND A.PAY_PROC_DT BETWEEN #{receiptCancel.strtDt} AND #{receiptCancel.endDt} /* 수납처리일 */
AND A.DPST_DT BETWEEN #{receiptCancel.strtDt} AND #{receiptCancel.endDt} /* 입금일자 */
AND A.TRANS_DT BETWEEN #{receiptCancel.strtDt} AND #{receiptCancel.endDt} /* 이체일자 */
AND A.REGR_ID = #{receiptCancel.usrId} /* 등록자ID */
AND A.DPST_CL = #{receiptCancel.pymTp} /* 입금구분 */
AND A.CNCL_YN = #{receiptCancel.cncl} /* 수납취소여부 */
AND A.PAY_TP = #{receiptCancel.rcptTp} /* 수납구분 */

SELECT A.SO_ID AS SO_ID /* SO_ID */ , A.BILL_YYMM AS BILL_YYMM /* 청구년월 */ , A.CNCL_YN AS CNCL /* 수납취소여부 */ , A.PYM_ACNT_ID AS PYM_ACNT_ID /* 납부계정ID */ ,(SELECT DISTINCT BB.ACNT_NM FROM IFNBRM_CUST_INFO BB WHERE A.PYM_ACNT_ID = BB.PYM_ACNT_ID ) AS ACNT_NM /* 납부계정명 */ , A.TRANS_DT AS TRANS_DT /* 이체일자 */ , A.DPST_DT AS DPST_DT /* 입금일자 */ ,(SELECT NAME.CODE_NM FROM TSYCO_CODE_MAST MAST , TSYCO_CODE_MAST_NAME MNAME , TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL DETAIL , TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL_NAME NAME WHERE MAST.COMMON_GRP = DETAIL.COMMON_GRP AND MAST.COMMON_GRP = MNAME.COMMON_GRP AND MNAME.LNG_TYP = #{receiptCancel.lngTyp} AND DETAIL.COMMON_GRP = NAME.COMMON_GRP AND DETAIL.COMMON_CD = NAME.COMMON_CD AND NAME.LNG_TYP = #{receiptCancel.lngTyp} AND MAST.COMMON_GRP = 'BL00067' AND DETAIL.COMMON_CD = A.DPST_CL AND DETAIL.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MAST.USE_YN = 'Y' ) AS DPST_CL_NM /* 입금구분명(BLPY001) */ ,(SELECT NAME.CODE_NM FROM TSYCO_CODE_MAST MAST , TSYCO_CODE_MAST_NAME MNAME , TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL DETAIL , TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL_NAME NAME WHERE MAST.COMMON_GRP = DETAIL.COMMON_GRP AND MAST.COMMON_GRP = MNAME.COMMON_GRP AND MNAME.LNG_TYP = #{receiptCancel.lngTyp} AND DETAIL.COMMON_GRP = NAME.COMMON_GRP AND DETAIL.COMMON_CD = NAME.COMMON_CD AND NAME.LNG_TYP = #{receiptCancel.lngTyp} AND MAST.COMMON_GRP = 'BL00079' AND DETAIL.COMMON_CD = A.PAY_TP AND DETAIL.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MAST.USE_YN = 'Y' ) AS PAY_TP_NM /* 수납구분명(BLPY013) */ , A.PAY_APLY_AMT AS BILL_AMT /* 청구금액 */ , A.PRE_RCPT_AMT AS PRE_RCPT_AMT /* 이전수납금액 */ , A.RCPT_AMT AS RCPT_AMT /* 수납금액 */ , A.PAY_PROC_DT AS PAY_PROC_DT /* 수납처리일자 */ , A.DPST_PROC_DT AS DPST_PROC_DT /* 입금처리일자 */ , B.CNCL_DTTM AS CNCL_DTTM /* 수납취소일시 */ , B.CNCLR_ID AS CNCLR_ID /* 취소자 */ , A.PYM_SEQ_NO AS PYM_SEQ_NO /* 수납일련번호 */ , A.BILL_DT AS BILL_DT /* 청구일자 */ , A.BILL_SEQ_NO AS BILL_SEQ_NO /* 청구일련번호 */ , C.USER_NAME AS USR_NM /* 등록자명 */ , A.REGR_ID AS REGR_ID /* 등록자ID */ , A.REG_DATE AS REG_DATE /* 등록일 */ , A.DPST_CL AS DPST_CL /* 입금구분 */ , A.PAY_TP AS PAY_TP /* 수납구분 */ FROM TBLPY_RCPT A LEFT OUTER JOIN TBLPY_RCPT_CNCL B ON A.PYM_SEQ_NO = B.PYM_SEQ_NO , TSYCO_USER C WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SO_ID = #{receiptCancel.soId} /* SO_ID */ AND C.USER_ID = A.REGR_ID AND A.DPST_CL <> '22' /* 필수조건 */ AND A.DPST_CL <> '40' /* 필수조건(청구차감된 원포인트는 수납취소불가) */
AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID = #{receiptCancel.pymAcntId} /* 납부계정ID */
AND A.PAY_PROC_DT BETWEEN #{receiptCancel.strtDt} AND #{receiptCancel.endDt} /* 수납처리일 */
AND A.DPST_DT BETWEEN #{receiptCancel.strtDt} AND #{receiptCancel.endDt} /* 입금일자 */
AND A.TRANS_DT BETWEEN #{receiptCancel.strtDt} AND #{receiptCancel.endDt} /* 이체일자 */
AND A.REGR_ID = #{receiptCancel.usrId} /* 등록자ID */
AND A.DPST_CL = #{receiptCancel.pymTp} /* 입금구분 */
AND A.CNCL_YN = #{receiptCancel.cncl} /* 수납취소여부 */
AND A.PAY_TP = #{receiptCancel.rcptTp} /* 수납구분 */

SELECT /* PaymentCancelMapper.xml.getTransApplCheckCnt, 양연희, 2018.01.04 */ A.APPL_CNT1 + B.APPL_CNT2 + C.APPL_CNT3 + D.APPL_CNT4 FROM (SELECT COUNT(TRANS_APPL_NO) AS APPL_CNT1 FROM TBLPY_TRANS_APPL WHERE TRANS_APPL_CL = '03' AND TRANS_APPL_TGT_NO IN (SELECT ASSR_OCC_SEQ_NO FROM TBLPY_RCPT_DTL A , TBLPY_ASSR_TRANS_HIST B WHERE A.PYM_SEQ_NO = #{pymSeqNo} AND B.ASSR_TRANS_SEQ_NO = A.ASSR_TRANS_SEQ_NO ) AND DCSN_PROC_STAT IN ('01','03') ) A ,(SELECT COUNT(C.RFND_SEQ_NO) AS APPL_CNT2 FROM TBLPY_RCPT A , TBLPY_DPST B , TBLPY_RFND_APPL C WHERE A.PYM_SEQ_NO = #{pymSeqNo} AND B.DPST_SEQ_NO = A.DPST_SEQ_NO AND C.RFND_OCC_TGT_SEQ_NO = B.PREPAY_OCC_SEQ_NO AND C.RFND_OCC_AMT_CL = '01' AND C.DCSN_PROC_STAT IN ('01','03') ) B , (SELECT COUNT(C.RFND_SEQ_NO) AS APPL_CNT3 FROM TBLPY_RCPT A , TBLPY_DPST B , TBLPY_RFND_APPL C WHERE A.PYM_SEQ_NO = #{pymSeqNo} AND B.DPST_SEQ_NO = A.DPST_SEQ_NO AND C.RFND_OCC_TGT_SEQ_NO = B.AMBG_OCC_SEQ_NO AND C.RFND_OCC_AMT_CL = '02' AND C.DCSN_PROC_STAT IN ('01','03') ) C ,(SELECT COUNT(C.RFND_SEQ_NO) AS APPL_CNT4 FROM TBLPY_RCPT A , TBLPY_DPST B , TBLPY_RFND_APPL C WHERE A.PYM_SEQ_NO = #{pymSeqNo} AND B.DPST_SEQ_NO = A.DPST_SEQ_NO AND C.RFND_OCC_TGT_SEQ_NO = B.ASSR_OCC_SEQ_NO AND C.RFND_OCC_AMT_CL = '03' AND C.DCSN_PROC_STAT IN ('01','03') ) D
